name: tagged
description: Web app for tagging cloud files

scripts.bundle:vendor: browserify --require react --require react/addons --require ./velocity/velocity.js --require immutable --require svg.js --require rsvp > ./vendor.js
scripts.build:app: npm run build:js && npm run build:jsx && npm run bundle:app && echo 'Done'
scripts.build: npm run bundle:vendor && npm run build:app
scripts.watch: npm run bundle:vendor && npm run watch:app
